'Glu Games' is a publisher of mobile games for smartphone and tablet devices.
Founded in San Francisco in 2001, Glu Mobile has since taken up office in more
than 4 countries. Glu Mobile offers products to multiple platforms including
iOS, Android, Amazon, Windows Phone and Google
Chrome http://www.glu.com/about
categories: Companies based in San Francisco, California
Video game companies of the United States
